title: PBE In Oceania
body:
I'm level 30 from oceania with 350+ wins. I have spent over $100 on this game and I really love it. It's a really fun game I can play with my friends that I want to invite them to. I want to watch this game grow, so I thought the best way would be to get a PBE account, unfortunately, PBE isn't it Oceania {{item:3070}} . I believe it is unfair that NA and other servers get PBE while just as popular servers get absolutely no way to try out anything new, or no way to give back to the community. 

Their input can never be heard, and that goes against the purpose of the PBE. Why catch the voice of the people, when you're going to exclude most of them. I know it's unlikely, but I hope someone from Riot sees this and how large the pole is (hopefully). Maybe then Oceania can properly express there love and enjoyment for this game, while still getting as much as voice as other servers

Cheers, James.

replies.body:
Should we have a PBE for OCE? I would like to say yes.

Are we going to get it? F\*ck no.

Riot can't even give us a solid Twisted Treeline queue over the weekend (apparently because there aren't enough people who play it, but I don't believe that sh!t any more). Riot have been screwing OCE over since they started our server, what makes you think they're going to do something nice for us now?

I know the chances are incredibly low, but there are 30 or so other threads asking for the same thing. So maybe, just maybe one of them will get a Rioter commenting on it. Having this thread just increases the chance.

> [{quoted}](name=xXFa2eScOpErXx,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=lYWbozQz,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-04-10T00:12:02.441+0000)
>
> I know the chances are incredibly low

You misunderstand. The chances aren't "incredibly low" so much as "non-existent". OCE isn't getting a PBE. At all. Ever. That simple, really.
I disagree, we've gotten Riot to change bigger things before.

If EU doesn't have a PBE why would OCE get one? NA is where all the dev happens, so it makes sense to have THE PBE there. There is only one, and likely will only ever be one. You can still play on the PBE if you manage to get an account.
I mean, all the servers get access to PBE.

Na has 1000 times (a bit over but you get the point) more people than oce, so its 100% fair that oce doesnt get one.
If the second most played server cant have pbe (eu) why the hell would the least played server (oce) have a pbe , if oce had a pbe the people on larger servers will just complain about the least played server getting pbe and why not theirs. Oce is put last on their say just because of the lack of numbers and well half of the oce players were banned because of toxicity (hence why oce ban system is rubbish atm)

To be honest its more likely for them to rework singeds passive, than making a oce pbe (singeds passive rework was confimed by a rioter 5 years ago, and yet too happen because the rioter in charge of it left{{champion:27}} {{item:3070}} )
Just dont ask for something this big without knowing how much effort a company has to do just to fill the needs of a few thousand people, if you really want pbe go move your account to na then sign up for pbe, its never going to happen on oce, one testing zone is enough for a game.

also if oce had pbe everyone will just move to it, then ranked queues on the normal server will just be extremely (more) shit for queue times and well.... it will just be plain horrid (like really i dont want to wait another 30 minutes for my ranked game i would probably loose from riven mains being cocky :P )
It's more about "it isn't fair for JUST NA to get it. But I see your point.
I completely agree why not get people's opinions on your new content from all the servers not just the others. OCE is small but we still exist :)
{{champion:17}} *Size doesn't matter* {{champion:17}}  nah but really if eu cant get pbe oce shouldn't really, have feelings for the people who bring you this game :)
Yes we are small and that's why they won't give it to us

To clarify, the PBE is kinda it's own region, it's physical location is in NA (and ONLY NA, no other regions have PBE) but there is nothing stopping you from applying for a PBE account. 

You can't login unless it's under an NA/EU account, but you can always create an NA account and apply for a PBE account. Yes you will play on lag but this isn't some case of OCE getting shafted. NA is Riot Games main headquarters, and the **_ONLY_** PBE server is there.

**tl;dr no other regions have PBE servers, only NA, but you can still play on PBE if you can get your hands on an account, you'll just be playing on lag.**

actually the thing holding us back is that fact that a PBE sever in oceania has a base of 260 ms so ya it kinda is holding us back
oh by the way im form the future :)

I WANT PBE AND IM IN OCEANIA
